snippet: The company revealed for the second time in three months that it had known about safety problems for years before alerting customers that there was a problem.
abstract: Mazda says it knew about ignition switch problem in its cars for seven years before recalling 4.9 million vehicles worldwide, including 1.4 million in United States.
lead_paragraph: The company revealed for the second time in three months that it had known about safety problems for years before alerting customers that there was a problem.

headline.print_headline: Mazda Issues Recall Over Safety Problem It Knew About for 7 Years
headline.main: After a Delay of Years, Mazda Recalls 4.9 Million Vehicles
